post.body: Happy new year yourself :-)
Thanks. We drank to your health today. Guarana Brasilia. In Newark. With Imigrasamba at the next table. Feel healthy yet?
As I said, you're a doll. The cutest most adorable thing. Yes you are.
Got a hoist. Now a bike hangs from the ceiling. Cool. Tomorrow morning on my way to the bathroom I shall hit a tire with my face. I know it.
Bloomberg speaks: "There's no such thing as a measured response to terrorism. Period." YAY Mayor!
Kids are weird. And funny. But mostly weird.
Having the teenage stepson live with me for 2 weeks was easy in all the ways I though it would be hell. And vice-versa.
Speaking of carols, some Xmas songs by The Ventures for your enjoyment http://cli.gs/sm6XYQ
E feliz Natal pra vocês também.
Merry Christmas, guys. Enjoy your family evening (or the Chinese food) and the morning gifts (or the Chinese food).
Just realized I missed the carols at Washington Sq. And I missed the carolers last eve at our lobby. Yes, this Jew likes Christmas carols.
Jewelry studio, 4hrs: great success! 2hrs in the evening to round things up: melted the bezel, broke the chain and busted the ring shank.
Be a sweetheart: go here http://cli.gs/Gy41PQ to VOTE FOR MY PHOTO! Thanks hon. You're a doll. The cutest most adorable thing. Yes you are.
At the airport waiting for @falameufilho 's special visitor
Monsters on Twitter http://tinyurl.com/6hzboj
Think I'll pass on sending my love this year.
Also try to write the exact same message in 12 different ways because they all know one another and might read each other's cards.
Greeting card 2.99 each. Int'l postage 1.69. Times 12, at least. 1hr in line cause I didn't buy the damn stamps when I could.
Bettie Page is gone http://tinyurl.com/5nzzfw RIP Bettie Page
If I ever say nabe instead of neighborhood you can slap me, have me committed or ship me back to Brazil. Or all of the above. NABE? Come on.
